description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for quiz-related endpoints in an LMS backend, including listing, creating, retrieving, submitting, and viewing attempts for quizzes, with role-based access control and AI-generated questions.

methods.name: isInstructor
methods.description: Checks if the user role indicates an instructor or admin.

methods.name: isLearner
methods.description: Checks if the user role indicates a learner.

methods.name: isValidId
methods.description: Validates that a raw input is a positive integer ID.

methods.name: isUserEnrolledInCourse
methods.description: Asynchronously checks if a user is enrolled in a specific course.

methods.name: questionsForTake
methods.description: Prepares quiz questions for the take endpoint by removing correct answer info.
